Load 2024_CSN_Report_Count.csv (skipping first 2 rows) and drop rows with any NA values.
Convert the 'Year' column to integer and the '# of Reports' column to integer after removing comma thousand-separators.
Extract the total number of reports recorded for the year 2007 from the cleaned count table.
Load 2024_CSN_Report_Categories.csv (skipping first 2 rows) and drop rows with any NA values.
Locate the 'Auto Related' row in the category table, strip the trailing '%' from its 'Percentage' value, convert it to a decimal proportion.
Estimate the hypothetical 2007 Auto Related count by multiplying that 2024 proportion by the 2007 total reports and rounding to the nearest integer.
